Project Name: Sentiment Analysis and Recommendation System for Drug Reviews
Problem Identification: Use NLP to analyze user drug reviews and predict sentiment; support drug recommendations; provide batch training/prediction and a real-time Flask API + web UI.
Data issues / EDA: Source: SQLite table drug_reviews_sentiment_analysis (161,297 rows). Some reviews contain HTML/escape characters; potential duplicates; null reviews dropped. Brief suggests train 112,908, eval 32,259, live 16,130; implementation used stratified 80/20 split for quick run.
ML Model: sklearn Pipeline: TfidfVectorizer(max_features=50000, ngram_range=(1,2)) + LogisticRegression(max_iter=1000). Test accuracy ~0.903; class metrics: negative precision/recall 0.876/0.751, positive precision/recall 0.911/0.960.
Preprocess: Labels from rating: >=7 positive, <=4 negative; 5–6 dropped. Drop null reviews. TF‑IDF lowercasing; word-level 1–2 ngrams. Stratified 80/20 split.
